overview: The story revolves around a real story of a woman who killed her husband and ripped his body into pieces. Soad Qassem, a young widow who left her husband with a fortune and the exhausted daughter Madiha (14 years) in the Smouha neighborhood, meets Mahmoud Elwan. And he widows to weave a sheet on her until he marries her, he gets a formal power to act in her property and destroys her balance in the bank and treats her as an abnormal wife and takes over her collections,
title: Woman and Cleaver
